home.1: Photography is 10% inspiration and 90% moving furniture.
home.2: The human body is a piece of art.
home.3: There are always two people in every picture: the photographer and the viewer.

portrait.1: A portrait is not made in the camera but on either side of it.
portrait.2: There are no bad pictures; that’s just how your face looks sometimes.
portrait.3: There are no bad pictures; that’s just how your face looks sometimes.

architecture.1: A good photograph is knowing where to stand.
architecture.2: All photographs are accurate. None of them is the truth.
architecture.3: A good photograph is knowing where to stand.
